replies.author: renanyan
replies.txt_content:
你试一下酱紫建个bat能行不
@ECHO OFF
SET BINDIR=%~dp0
"C:\Program Files\Java\jre7\bin\java.exe(介是java安装的路径，你改成你的)" -Xincgc -Xmx1G -jar "F:\minecraft\1.2.4\server\minecraft_server.jar（介是服务端的路径，也改成你的）"
PAUSE
